article.title: ITT Radar Contract Modified
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: ITT Corporation Electronic Systems Radar Systems - Gilfillan, Van Nuys, California, is being awarded a more than $19 million contract modification for AN/SPS-48G(V) radar modification kits to support the Recovery Obsolescence Availability Radar (ROAR).Â AN/SPS-48's are radars that are installed on Navy ships for volume air search and surveillance. The modification kits are expected to increase operational availability and decrease operating and support costs. The Naval Sea Systems Command, Washington, D.C., is the contracting activity.
